alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 6:43PM MDT until August 03 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE MCBRIDE BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY... At 643 PM MDT, Emergency management reported flash flooding on Gavilan Ridge within the McBride Burn Scar. Although heavy rain has ended, up to 1.39 inches of rain fell on the scar earlier. Flash flooding is ongoing. Flash flooding will impact Gavilan Canyon Road, Blue Lake Drive, Eagle Creek Canyon Road and areas downstream to the Rio Ruidoso. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the McBride Burn Scar. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the McBride Burn Scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ruidoso, Ruidoso Downs and Hollywood. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
